participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

SOS_01.LongName: Which category best describes your feelings of sexual attraction to others?

Levels.3: Equally attracted to females and males

SOS_02.LongName: In your lifetime, have you had sex with only males, only females, both males and femlaes or have you not had sex?

SOS_03.LongName: In the preceding year, have you had sex with only males, only females, both males and females or have you not had sex?

SOS_04.LongName: Which of the categories best describes you?
